search.query: index=kafka sourcetype=kafka processName="Kafka-Mirror-Maker-Process-*" | stats count by environment
index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ processName="Kafka-Mirror-Maker-Process-*" | stats count by processName
index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ host=*mirror* domainName=cpu | timechart latest(usedCpuPercent) as usedCpuPercent by host
index=kafka sourcetype=kafka domainName=memory environment=$env$ host=*mirror* | timechart latest(totalMem) as TotalMemory, latest(usedMem) as UsedMemory, latest(buffers) as Buffers by host

index=kafka sourcetype=kafka environment=$env$ processName=$pn$ queryName="type=MirrorMaker,name=MirrorMaker-numDroppedMessages/Value" | eval tp=split(queryName,"type=MirrorMaker,name=") | eval newQuery=mvindex(tp,1) | eval query_host=newQuery.":".host | timechart latest(queryValue) by query_host useother=f
